channel.title: Quiz on Volatile Int
channel.description: Recent content in Quiz on Volatile Int

item.title: How well do you REALLY know auto type deduction?
item.description:
One of the most iconic C++ features is the language’s ability to deduce types with the auto keyword. In this post, I’ll give a bunch of example code snippits. Your job is to assess what will be deduced - including its type, if its a reference or not, and CV qualifiers. The examples in each section increase in difficulty. Good luck!

Auto Type Deduction Quiz

Conclusion

You can check any of these by using this GodBolt link. godbolt.org/z/3EcGaTxb9). Shoutout to this Stack Overflow thread which provided the code snippit to get human readable names given a type.
